:: Rainchark ::

:: Rainchark bangs his com-link on his knee, wondering why Shockwave 
wasn't responding.  His efforts to "fix" his com-link left him 
vulnerable to the gernade that was incoming.  It exploded on impact, 
causing his left leg to malfunction.  It was to be injured until he 
could get into a CR chamber.  Rainchark fires 4 blasts at Holocaust 
and turns around to see a flaming sword. ::

Not this time!

:: Desends below Pyrotaur and fires one missle at Pyrotaur.  ::
